name: Embed Widget
info:
Add an embed page to the room
Generally, you need the **src** link from the embed code

![](https://i.imgur.com/60iUKdI.png)


Here are some sample:

Youtube (embed link)
https://www.youtube.com/embed/6THHrPyZQuQ


Vimeo (simple link) https://vimeo.com/105438077)

Google Maps (get src link from embed code) https://www.google.com/maps/embed?pb=!1m28!1m12!1m3!1d1327427.7955557902!2d2.746197289197234!3d49.491721948683754!2m3!1f0!2f0!3f0!3m2!1i1024!2i768!4f13.1!4m13!3e6!4m5!1s0x47e664f93278928d%3A0xc749b6b4e73d3630!2sParis%20La%20D%C3%A9fense%20Arena%2C%20Rue%20des%20Sorins%2C%20Nanterre!3m2!1d48.895279099999996!2d2.2294676!4m5!1s0x47c2d579b3256e11%3A0x40af13e81646360!2sLille!3m2!1d50.62925!2d3.0572559999999998!5e0!3m2!1sfr!2sfr!4v1585350925157!5m2!1sfr!2sfr

name: Create Contact in Pipedrive
info:
# Pipedrive connection with adding contact.

**pipedrive_apikey** - It's your private Apikey from Pipedrive. 

It can be found on pipedrive website under **Settings** > **Personal preferences** > **API**.
![enter image description here](https://support.pipedrive.com/hc/article_attachments/360004782498/Screen_Shot_2019-11-17_at_12.03.12_PM.png)


---




**msg.name** - Name of conntact you want to add

**msg.email** - E-mail of conntact you want to add

**msg.phone** - Phone number of conntact you want to add.

info:
Human handover or takeover
Invite a Human Operator to a discussion

name: Send message
info: Another way to send a simple message to the room

name: Send Video
info:
Send a video to a room

Use the MXC link and not a simple url

ses how to get the MXC link: [http://bit.ly/get-mxc-link](http://bit.ly/get-mxc-link)

name: Typing
info:
Place the typing node just before the interaction node, like text node.
The typing time is arount 2s but you can modify that value inside the subflow

![](https://i.imgur.com/ymFjS3b.png)

send message
Framework
info:
Framework: 

1-Trigger (slash command, action on msg, menu, text msg, webhook, response from api call, cron job, trigger (for testing))

2- Response/acknowledge (200 if webhook, notif if action takes time)

3- Condition, filter - busines rule (type of request, use swich node, custom function (blocky)

4- Data Manipulation: prepare the payload that will be use for the Actions & Notification

5- Action-s (form to display, api call)

6- Notification message (channel, external service, debug node,..)
